alert.note: Alert for Grant Grove Area; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; Sequoia NP; South End of the Upper Sierra; Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 19 at 3:35AM PST until January 23 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 PM PST SUNDAY ABOVE 6000 FEET... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE MONDAY NIGHT ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory above 6000 feet, snow expected. Snow accumulations of 6 to 18 inches through Sunday afternoon. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Winter Storm Watch above 7000 feet, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 feet possible. * WHERE...Portions of central California. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 10 PM Friday to 4 PM PST Sunday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Sunday afternoon through late Monday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Grant Grove Area; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; Sequoia NP; South End of the Upper Sierra; Upper San Joaquin River; Yosemite NP outside of the valley
